data.text:
The Lobby of this hotel is very pretty, and the rooms are clean and spacious. Izmir is a diverse city , I wouldn't particularity recommend Basmane for a long-time stay, but if it's for a few nights you'll be okay - the konak pier is very close by with the tram, where you can get a ferryboat across the city. The staff are kind, efficient and lovely people - the night staff , the people working in the morning, everybody is very helpful.  For the people who are commenting on the English of the staff - their English was perfectly fine, and being a guest in a Turkish Hotel, you should understand that not everybody will accomodate for you completely with language. It would be great for guests to learn a little Turkish before complaining about the English of the staff. 

I would recommend this hotel to people who are looking for a work trip hotel, short stay - or a place to sleep after travelling the city all day :-)
data.title: A pleasant hotel.

data.text: The hotel is nice, very clean and the staff is super helpfull and kind. the breakfast was good aswell you have a little bit from everything. the rooms are big, and a big bathroom. interior is modern too. the location is escellent very close to the tubes 3minutes away. and all the strees full os shops and 15minutes walk to the pier and sea. i definatly recomend this hotel.
data.title: 100% SATISFIED

data.text: Everything was perfect, clean and comfortable. Friendly and helpful staff. They made themselves available for any request. The hotel is located 20 minutes by the walk from the city center, which is really close. We will definitely be back.
data.title: Perfect

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Ontur Hotels has been working by targeting 100% Guest satisfaction with both Quality understanding and Guest Oriented service and service standards. For this reason, your opinions are very valuable to us.

Thank you for your rating and comments indicating that you are satisfied with our hotel.

We hope you will always see Ontur Hotel as your 'home in Izmir', 
We will be very pleased to welcome you again in our hotel.

Best Regards.
owner_response.author: Aylin  Katrancı

data.text:
Ontur Otel Izmir is located in the center of Konak area and easy to reach shopping district. Walking distance to Basmane train station. I spent a night at this hotel for business purposes.

Breakfast is full of variety of local food.

The room size and comfort was great and got all the amenities you need in the room.

The staff was very helpful. I definitely come back again. Recommended to everyone.
data.title: Home Comfort

owner_response.title: Owner response

data.text: We (two friends ans myself) stayed five days at this hotel. It is supposed to be a 5 star hotel, but that’s clearly a lie. The carpet in the room smelled terribly to the point we had to switch rooms. The breakfast was awful. The towels had holes and almost  nobody spoke english. The hotel is in the city center and they kindly change us to another room but it’s not a five stars hotel.
data.title: Stay away

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Ontur Hotels has worked by targeting 100% Guest satisfaction with both Quality understanding and Guest Oriented service and service standards. For this reason, your opinions are very valuable to us, in your comments and scoring; We regret that you have evaluated some of our hotel and services as weak. As of December, the carpets of our rooms have been renewed. Diversification studies on our breakfast are continuing. We will make our services perfect and eliminate the deficiencies. We hope that you will experience the changes in the coming days and always see Ontur Hotel as your 'home in Izmir', 
We would be very pleased to welcome you again in our hotel. Best Regards.
owner_response.author: Aylin  Katrancı
